description:
Certificate of Lawfulness (existing) for use of the first floor as a 2 bedroom self-contained flat. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  Site location plan (edged in red) 3                         x Tenancy Agreements dated 6/8/93,                         1/4/99 and 1/3/01, completion letter                         dated 10/8/93, Enquiries Before                         Contract Form dated 5/8/93, Rent                         Book dated 20/8/93, 2 x Land                         Registry Forms dated 13/5/96 and 24/                         3/98, 2 x floor plans of the                         property dated October 1993 and fax                         dated 27/6/02
decision_conditions: REASON: The conversion of the first floor of the property from offices to a self-contained flat began more than four years before the date of this application in accordance with Section 172 (4)c of the above Act.
